alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 11:01AM CDT until May 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Louisiana. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Chester. Mississippi River at Clarksville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Winfield. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.5 feet, At this stage, Lock and Dam 25 will stockpile 200 tons of sand, 12,000 sandbags, and 10,000 square feet of polyethylene plastic as a precaution. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Monday was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 24.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Winfield 26.0 26.0 25.6 25.1 24.8 24.4 24.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
